about.heading: Know Who
about.description: Hi Everyone, I am Malek Ba Abbad from Hadhramout, Yemen. I am currently employed as a Front-End developer at Arab WareDoss. I completed my bachelor's in Management Information Systems at Yarmouk University, Jordan, where I also served as the Head of the Yemeni community, actively contributing to its activities and initiatives.
about.activities: Apart from coding, some other activities that I love to do!

projects.heading: My Recent
projects.description: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.

balleghny.title: Balleghny Dashboard
balleghny.description: This dashboard system is a modern, responsive web application It provides an intuitive interface for handle employees tasks. The dashboard features secure authentication and real-time data fetching from APIs

cinema.title: Cinema Club
cinema.description: A modern, responsive movie discovery web application that helps users explore and find movies based on different criteria. Built with vanilla JavaScript and powered by The Movie Database (TMDB) API.

binDowal.title: Bin Dowal Pay Wallet
binDowal.description: The leading online payment gateway in Yemen – secure financial transactions anytime, anywhere.

logistics.title: Bin Dowal Contracting and Logistics
logistics.description: company specializes in general contracting, focusing on construction, building projects, infrastructure development, roadworks and maintenance, water solutions, and electrical engineering solutions.

radiation.title: Mukalla Radiation Center
radiation.description: A streamlined design that provides easy access to critical information about their radiotherapy services.

dalil.title: Employees Information System
dalil.description: An integrated platform for easily and efficiently searching for bank employees. Search by entering the employee's name, job title, telephone number, or even mobile number and email.

mikrotik.title: Mikrotik Login Page
mikrotik.description: Design and develop a login page for local MikroTik networks to access the internet using prepaid cards.

bank.title: Bin Dowal's Bank
bank.description: Bin Dowal's Bank website offers a clean, user-friendly interface that focuses on providing access to Islamic microfinance solutions.

arab.title: Arab Exchange Company
arab.description: Offers banking services compliant with Central Bank regulations.

services.heading: What
services.description: Here are a few projects I've worked on recently.

webDev.title: Web Development and Managment
webDev.description: Build responsive and user-friendly websites tailored to your business needs.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: Design intuitive and visually appealing interfaces to enhance user engagement.

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Support
maintenance.description: Provide ongoing maintenance and support to ensure your systems run smoothly.
